1864084.effect: You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) by Tributing 1 Plant monster. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Rose Dragon" monster from your hand or GY. You can only use this effect of "Magink Angel of Roses" once per turn. When you Ritual Summon a "Rose Dragon" monster, you can banish this card from your GY as 1 of the monsters required for the Ritual Summon.
1864084.name: Magink Angel of Roses

1864827.effect: If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can add 1 "Magink Rose Rising", or 1 Spell/Trap that specifically lists the card "Black Rose Dragon" in its text, from your Deck to your hand. If this card is sent from the field to the GY: You can target 1 "Rose Dragon" or 1 Level 4 or higher Plant monster in your GY, except "Magink Red Rose Dragon"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Magink Red Rose Dragon" once per turn.
1864827.name: Magink Red Rose Dragon

1864875.effect: You can only use 1 of the following effects of "Magink Rose Maiden" per turn, and only once that turn.● If this card is Tributed for a Ritual Summon: You can target 1 Dragon or Plant monster in your GY; shuffle it into the Deck, then draw 1 card.● If this card is sent to the GY as Synchro Material: You can banish 1 card from either GY.● If this card is destroyed by card effect: You can destroy 1 monster your opponent controls.
1864875.name: Magink Rose Maiden

1864054.effect: When this card destroys an opponent's monster by battle: You can add 1 "Magink" card from your Deck to your hand, except "Magink Rose Paladin". If you control a "Rose Dragon" monster: You can banish this card from your GY; until the end of this turn, negate the effects of all face-up monsters your opponent currently controls, except Plant monsters. You can only use this effect of "Magink Rose Paladin" once per turn.
1864054.name: Magink Rose Paladin

1864818.effect: You can discard this card and 1 "Rose Dragon" monster or Plant monster; add 1 "Rose Dragon" monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Magink White Rose Dragon". If a monster(s) you control is destroyed by card effect, while this card is in your GY (except during the Damage Step): You can Special Summon this card, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Magink White Rose Dragon" once per turn.
1864818.name: Magink White Rose Dragon

1864832.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Magink Rose Rising". During your Main Phase: You can banish any number of Dragon and/or Plant monsters from your GY, then destroy an equal number of cards your opponent controls. You can only use this effect of "Magink Rose Dragon" once per turn. If this card in your possession is sent to your GY by your opponent's card effect: You can Special Summon 1 Level 7 or lower Dragon or Plant Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck. (This is treated as a Synchro Summon.)
1864832.name: Magink Black Rose Dragon

1864837.effect: The first time this face-up card on the field would be destroyed by a card effect, it is not destroyed. You can only use each of the following effects of "Magink Corruption" once per turn.●You can discard 1 card, then target 1 monster you control; destroy it.●If a face-up monster(s) you control is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can add 1 "Magink" monster with a different name from your Deck to your hand.
1864837.name: Magink Corruption

1864829.effect: This card is used to Ritual Summon "Magink Black Rose Dragon". You must also Tribute monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster you Ritual Summon. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card, 1 Dragon monster, and 1 Plant monster from your GY, including a Tuner; Special Summon 1 "Rose" Synchro Monster or 1 Plant Synchro Monster from your Extra Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions. You can only use this effect of "Magink Rose Rising" once per turn.
1864829.name: Magink Rose Rising

1816956.effect: If you control an "Impcantation" Ritual Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. If all monsters you control are "Impcantation" monsters (min. 1): You can add 1 "Impcantation" card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use 1 "Impcantation Mudjar" effect per turn, and only once that turn. Cannot be Special Summoned from the Deck. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck. This card's activated effects cannot be negated by the effects of Ritual Monsters.
1816956.name: Impcantation Mudjar

1816951.effect: If you control an "Impcantation" Ritual Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. During the Standby Phase: You can activate this effect; this turn, the effects of "Impcantation" Ritual Monsters in your possession can be activated as Quick Effects. You can only use 1 "Impcantation Spiritbell" effect per turn, and only once that turn. Cannot be Special Summoned from the Deck. You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck. This card's activated effects cannot be negated by the effects of Ritual Monsters.
1816951.name: Impcantation Spiritbell

1865422.effect: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; return it to the hand, and if you do, return 1 other face-up "Majespecter" card you control to the hand. This is a Quick Effect if all monsters you control are WIND Spellcaster monsters. You can only use this effect of "Majespecter Dragon - Ryu" once per turn. Cannot be targeted or destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
1865422.name: Majespecter Dragon - Ryu

1833842.effect: You can target 1 "Mathmech" monster you control; send 1 "Mathmech" monster from your Deck to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon this card from your hand, then, you can increase this card's Level by up to half that target's. You can only use this effect of "Mathmech Modulus" once per turn.
1833842.name: Mathmech Modulus

1816932.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Impcantation Inception". You can reveal this card in your hand; discard 1 card, and if you do, add 2 "Impcantation" cards with different names from your GY to your hand. You can target 1 monster your opponent controls that has a Level; take control of it, and if you do, it is treated as an "Impcantation" monster, then, Ritual Summon 1 "Impcantation" Ritual Monster from your hand or Deck by Tributing "Impcantation" monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal or exceed the Level of the Ritual Monster. You can only use each effect of "Impcantation Geodogma" once per turn.
1816932.name: Impcantation Geodogma

1865471.effect: Tribute 1 DARK monster; look at your opponent's hand and Extra Deck, and banish all those monsters from either your opponent's hand or Extra Deck (your choice) with the same original ATK as the Tributed monster. You can only use this effect of "Haunting Havoc Virus" once per turn.
1865471.name: Haunting Havoc Virus

1820014.effect:
Send 1 other card from your hand or field to the GY, then declare 1 Monster Card name on the field; apply 1 of these effects, or, if you control less monsters than your opponent does, you can apply both and resolve in sequence.
● Draw 1 card for each face-up card in your opponent's possession with that name.
● Your opponent destroys as many monsters they control with that name as possible.
You can only activate 1 "Rush Dive" per turn.
1820014.name: Rush Dive

1820196.effect:
2 monsters with the same Level, Type, and Attribute
You can reveal 1 monster in your hand; this card gains ATK equal to half the DEF of the revealed monster, but it cannot attack directly. At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: You can banish both monsters. During the End Phase, if this card is in the GY, and was sent there this turn: You can Special Summon it, but its ATK/DEF are halved. You can only use each effect of "Displacement Eradicator" once per turn.
1820196.name: Displacement Eradicator

1865338.effect:
1 non-Link "Majespecter" monster
You can only Special Summon "Majespecter Dog - Inukami" once per turn. If this card is Link Summoned: You can shuffle 1 face-up "Majespecter" Pendulum Monster from your Extra Deck into the Deck, then you can add 1 "Majespecter" monster from your Deck to your hand with the same Level. Cannot be targeted or destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
1865338.name: Majespecter Dog - Inukami

1834121.effect:
2 non-Token Normal Monsters with different names
(Quick Effect): You can target 1 face-up monster on the field that has a Level; send Normal Monsters from your Deck to the GY with different Levels, whose total Levels equal the Level of that target, and if you do, destroy that target. You can only use this effect of "Tin Soldier" once per turn.
1834121.name: Tin Soldier

1869131.effect:
(This card is always treated as a "New Order" card.) You can only activate 1 "Entrance to Astral World" per turn. Target 1 "New Order" monster in your GY: Special Summon it, then, if possible, attach this card to that monster as material. A "New Order" monster that has this card as material gains the following effect:
● Once per turn, you can detach 1 material from this card: Special Summon from your Extra Deck or GY, 1 "New Order" Xyz Monster that is 2 Ranks lower than this card, then attach this card to it as material (This Special Summon is treated as an Xyz Summon. Xyz Materials attached to it also become Xyz Materials on the Summoned monster.)
1869131.name: Entrance to Astral World

1610412.effect: (This is treated as a "New Order" card) Banish 1 Xyz Monster from your Graveyard that was destroyed this turn; Special Summon from your Extra Deck, 1 Xyz Monster that is 2 Ranks higher than the banished Xyz Monster, ignoring the Summoning conditions (This is treated as an Xyz Summon). You can only use 1 "Ascension Spiral" per turn.
1610412.name: Ascension Spiral

1869026.effect:
2 Level 4 monsters, including a "New Order" monster
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 non-Xyz "New Order" monster in your GY: Special Summon it, but for the rest of the turn, you cannot summon monsters from the Extra Deck, except "New Order" Monsters. If a "New Order" Xyz Monster is Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by the effect of a "Rank-Up-Magic" card; You can Special Summon this card from your GY, then attach a card from your GY to this card as material. You can only use 1 effect of "New Order 4: Etheric Chimera" per turn, and only once per turn.
1869026.name: New Order 4: Etheric Chimera

1869051.effect:
4 Level 8 monsters
You can detach 1 material from this card, then target 1 other face-up monster you control: It can make a second attack during the Battle Phase this turn, and any monster it battles loses 500 ATK. If this card is in your GY, you can banish this card and 10 other "New Order" cards from your GY; Special Summon, from your Extra Deck, 1 "New Order 13: Etheric Amon", and if you do, attach the top 3 cards from both players Decks onto it as material (This is treated as an Xyz Summon.) You can only use each effect of "New Order 8: Etheric Dragon" once per turn.
1869051.name: New Order 8: Etheric Dragon

1869502.effect: Target 1 card in your Pendulum Zone: Make that card's Pendulum Scale equal to another card's Pendulum Scale in other Pendulum Zone on either side of the field. You can only activate 1 "Cosmic Primal - The Reflection Realm" per turn.
1869502.name: Cosmic Primal - The Reflection Realm

1865171.effect: 2 Fairy-Type monsters, including 1 "Cosmic Primal" monsterIf this card is Link Summoned: You can add 1 "Cosmic Primal" card from your Deck to your hand, then show your hand to your opponent. During the Main Phase: You can destroy 1 card this card points to; add 1 card from your Deck to your hand with the same card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) as the destroyed card. If the Pendulum Scale of one of your "Cosmic Primal" card in your Pendulum Zones changes: You can increase or decrease the Pendulum Scale of other card in your Pendulum Zones by the same amount. You can only use each effect of "Cosmic Primal - The Moral" once per turn.
1865171.name: Cosmic Primal - The Moral

1865214.effect: 3 "Cosmic Primal" monstersMust be either Fusion Summoned, or Special Summoned from your Extra Deck by Tributing the above cards you control (in which case you do not use "Polymerization", and that Summon its treated as a Fusion Summon), and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can Special Summon any number of "Cosmic Primal" cards from your Pendulum Zones. During the Main Phase: You can destroy any number of cards in your Pendulum Zones; Your opponent discards cards fron their hand equal to the number of cards destroyed by this effect (Their choice.). You can only use each effect of "Cosmic Primal - Mind" once per turn.
1865214.name: Cosmic Primal - Mind

1869524.effect: If a "Charismatic" card(s) is sent to your GY: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. If this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can target 1 card on the field; destroy it, then banish 1 card from your GY, face-down. You can only use each effect of "Jaren, Charismatic Interpreter" once per turn.
1869524.name: Jaren, Charismatic Interpreter

1869377.effect: When your opponent activates a monster effect on the field while you control a "Charismatic" monster (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 LIGHT Spellcaster Link Monster, by using only that opponent's monster and monsters you control as material, then banish 1 card from your GY, face-down. You can only use this effect of "Johnson, Charismatic Adjudicator" once per turn.
1869377.name: Johnson, Charismatic Adjudicator

1869509.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Charismatic" card from your Deck to your GY. If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material: You can target 1 "Charismatic" card in your GY, except "Charismatic Philosopher"; add it to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Jones, Charismatic Philosopher" once per turn.
1869509.name: Jones, Charismatic Philosopher

1869356.effect: During your opponent's turn (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon 1 "Charismatic Energy Token" (Fairy/LIGHT/Level 5/ATK 1000/DEF 1000), then gain 1000 LP. If this card is in your GY: You can return 1 Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster from your field or GY to your Extra Deck; Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Jordan, Charismatic Healer" once per turn.
1869356.name: Jordan, Charismatic Healer

1870561.effect: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do: Special Summon 1 "Charismatic" Link Monster from your Extra Deck, then banish cards from your GY, face-down, equal to its Link Rating on the field, but it cannot activate its effects until the end of your next turn, also you cannot Special Summon monsters from your Extra Deck for the rest of this turn. (This is treated as a Link Summon.) If a "Charismatic" Link Monster in your Extra Monster Zone would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY, instead. You can only use 1 "Charismatic Holy Recompense" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1870561.name: Charismatic Holy Recompense

1869477.effect: "Charismatic" monsters you control gain 500 ATK/DEF. You can discard 1 card; add 1 "Charismatic" card from your Deck to your hand with the same card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap) but a different name. You can only use this effect of "Charismatic Scales of Justice" once per turn. You can only control 1 "Charismatic Scales of Justice".
1869477.name: Charismatic Scales of Justice

1869495.effect: When your opponent activates a monster effect while you control a Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, if you control a LIGHT monster, Tribute that opponent's monster. You can only activate 1 "Charismatic Divine Intervention" per turn.
1869495.name: Charismatic Divine Intervention

1869470.effect: If you control no non-LIGHT monsters: Special Summon 1 "Charismatic" monster from your Deck, also it cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects for the rest of this turn. You can only activate 1 "The Charismatic Divine Book" per turn.
1869470.name: The Charismatic Divine Book

1686388.effect:
2 non-Link Monsters with different Types
Cannot be used as Link Material the turn it is Link Summoned. Linked monsters on the field cannot be Tributed, also they gain 300 ATK. Any card Tributed and sent to the GY is banished instead. Once per turn, during the End Phase: Tribute 1 monster you control.
1686388.name: Charismatic Acolyte

1313930.effect:
2 monsters, including a monster owned by your opponent
You cannot Special Summon monsters from the Extra Deck. (Quick Effect): You can target 1 monster your opponent controls; take control of it, also banish it face-down if this card leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Charismatic Priest" once per turn. If this card would be destroyed by an opponent's card, you can destroy 1 monster you control that your opponent owns, instead. If you control 5 monsters owned by your opponent, you win the Duel.
1313930.name: Charismatic Priest

1558753.effect:
2 Effect Monsters, including a "Charismatic" monster
During your opponent's Main Phase, if you control this card in the Extra Monster Zone and no other monsters (Quick Effect): You can look at up to 2 random cards in your opponent's hand, then, you can Special Summon 1 monster from among the revealed cards and your opponent's GY, but its effects are negated. During your opponent's Main or Battle Phase, you can (Quick Effect): Immediately after this effect resolves, Link Summon 1 Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster using materials you control, including this card. You can only use each effect of "Charismatic Priestess" once per turn.
1558753.name: Charismatic Priestess

1565558.effect: If you control a Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monster: Target 1 Set card your opponent controls; send it to the GY, then you can Set it to your field. You can only activate 1 "Charismatic Divine Conversion" per turn.
1565558.name: Charismatic Divine Conversion

1868436.effect:
2 LIGHT Spellcaster monsters, including a "Charismatic" monster
(Quick Effect): You can target 1 LIGHT Spellcaster monster in your GY; Special Summon it, but you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Link-2 Spellcaster Link Monsters. You can only use this effect of "Charismatic Minister" once per turn.
1868436.name: Charismatic Minister

1870366.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 (Charismatic) monster from your hand or GY. If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material for the Summon of a (Charismatic) Link Monster, you can pay 1000 LP; Special Summon this card from your GY, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except (Charismatic) monsters. You can only use each effect of (Charismatic Healer) once per turn.
1870366.name: Charismatic Healer

1870387.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can send 1 (Charism) card from your Deck to the GY. If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material for the Summon of a (Charismatic) Link Monster, you can shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck; Special Summon 1 (Charismatic) monster from your GY, except (Charismatic Necromancer), also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except (Charismatic) monsters. You can only use each effect of (Charismatic Necromancer) once per turn.
1870387.name: Charismatic Necromancer

1870348.effect: When this card is Normal or Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 (Charism Token) (Spellcaster/LIGHT/ATK 0/DEF 0) to your side of the field. If this card is sent to the GY as Link Material for the Summon of a (Charismatic) Link Monster, you can discard 1 card; add 1 (Charism) Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of (Charismatic Servant) once per turn.
1870348.name: Charismatic Servant

1870509.effect: Equip only to a (Charismatic) monster. It gains 500 ATK, and it cannot be targeted by card effects. (Quick Effect) You can Tribute the monster this card is equipped to: Take control of 1 card your opponent controls. It cannot attack and its effects are negated. If this card leaves the field while equipped to a monster, your opponent draws 1 card, then discards 1 card. You can only control 1 (Enigma - Sword of True Charism), and you can only activate 1 (Enigma - Sword of True Charism) per turn.
1870509.name: Enigma - Sword of True Charism

1870488.effect: Tribute 1 monster you control or 1 monster you control that is owned by your opponent; Special Summon 1 (Charismatic) monster from your Deck. If you Tributed a monster you controlled that was owned by your opponent, you can Special Summon 2 monsters, instead, but if you do, those monsters effects are negated. You can banish this card from your GY and discard 1 card; reveal 2 random cards in your opponents hand, and if there is a Monster among those cards, Special Summon it time your side of the field. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except Charismatic monsters. You can only activate 1 (Forbidden Charism) per turn.
1870488.name: Forbidden Charism

1870506.effect: You can target 1 monster on the field: Gain LP equal to that monsters ATK. If you control a monster that is owned by your opponent at this cards activation, you can draw 1 card. You can banish this card from your GY; shuffle 5 (Charism) cards that are banished or in the GY into the Deck; draw 1 card. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except (Charismatic) monsters. You can only activate 1 (Healing Charism) per turn.
1870506.name: Healing Charism

1870496.effect: If you control a monster that is owned by your opponent, you can pay 1000 LP; destroy 1 card on the field. You must control 2 or more (Charismatic) monsters to resolve this effect. You can only use this effect of (Judgment Charism) once per turn. (Charismatic) monsters cannot be destroyed by card effects, and if they would be destroyed the first time by battle, they are not. You cannot Summon monsters the turn you activate this card, except (Charismatic) monsters. You can only activate 1 (Judgement Charism) per turn.
1870496.name: Judgement Charism

1870512.effect: All (Charismatic) monsters gain 500 ATK. You can discard 1 card: Add 1 (Charism) card from your Deck to your hand. You can Tribute 1 (Charismatic) Link Monster, then target an equal number of cards on the field equal to its Link Rating; return them to the hand. (Quick Effect) If you control a (Charismatic) monster, immediately after this resolves, Link Summon 1 (Charismatic) Link Monster, using monsters you control as Link Material. If this card is sent to the GY, you can pay 1000 LP; reveal your opponents hand, but if you do, you must reveal your hand as well. You can only use each effect of (Ruins of Charism) once per turn. You can only activate 1 (Ruins of Charism) per turn.
1870512.name: Ruins of Charism

1870425.effect: When this card is Link Summoned: Target 1 monster in your opponents GY; Special Summon it to your side of the field. Immediately after this resolves, Link Summon 1 (Charismatic) Link Monster, using monsters you control as material. You can discard 1 card; gain 2000 LP. You must control a monster that is owned by your opponent to resolve this effect. You can only use each effect of (Charismatic Astrologist) once per turn.
1870425.name: Charismatic Astrologist

1870469.effect:
2+ monsters, including a monster you control that is owned by your opponent and a (Charismatic) monster
When this card is Link Summoned: Target 1 Spell/Trap on the field; Shuffle it into the Deck. If you control (Charismatic Paladin) (Quick Effect), you can Tribute any number of monsters you control that are owned by your opponent: Draw 1 card for each monster Tributed with a different name. If 10 or more monsters are Tributed by this effect, and you have less than 4000 LP, you win the Duel. You can discard 1 card; your opponent discards 1 card. You must control a monster that is owned by your opponent to resolve this effect. You can only use each effect of (Charismatic Empress) once per turn.
1870469.name: Charismatic Empress

1870461.effect:
2+ monsters, including a monster you control that is owned by your opponent and a (Charismatic) monster
When this card is Link Summoned: Target 1 monster on the field; Send it to the GY. If you control (Charismatic Empress) (Quick Effect), you can discard any number of cards: Take control of an equal number of monsters your opponent controls. Their effects are negated, and they cannot attack. You can discard 1 card; both players reveal their hands, also discard all Traps among the revealed cards. You must control a monster that is owned by your opponent to resolve this effect. You can only use each effect of (Charismatic Paladin) once per turn.
1870461.name: Charismatic Paladin

1871955.effect: "The great hero from the far west."
1871955.name: Hero of the West

1871963.effect: "Warrior of the East" + "Warrior of the West"If this card is Fusion Summoned: You can add 1 Warrior-Type monster from your Deck or GY to your hand, but you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Warrior-Type monsters. You can tribute 1 Warrior-Type monster; Special Summon 1 Warrior-Type monster from your Deck or GY, but make its ATK/DEF 0, also you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Warrior-Type monsters. You can only use each effect of "Warrior of the Lost Land" once per turn.
1871963.name: Hero of the Lost Land

1807183.effect:
FLIP: You can add 1 "Submerzan" monster from your Deck to your hand.
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-down Defense Position. If your opponent targets this card for an attack or an effect, while it is face-down: Change this card to face-up Attack Position, then, if it was targeted by an effect, you can negate that effect. During your Main Phase: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Akularks of the Submerzans" per turn.
1807183.name: Akularks of the Submerzans

1807184.effect:
FLIP: You can add 1 "Submerzan" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your hand.
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-down Defense Position. If your opponent targets this card for an attack or an effect, while it is face-down: Change this card to face-up Attack Position, then, if it was targeted by an effect, you can banish 1 card from your opponent's GY. During your Main Phase: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Mynoctos of the Submerzans" per turn.
1807184.name: Mynoctos of the Submerzans

1807131.effect:
FLIP: You can add 1 "Submerzan" card from your GY to your hand.
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-down Defense Position. If your opponent targets this card for an attack or an effect, while it is face-down: Change this card to face-up Attack Position, then, if it was targeted by an effect, you can draw 1 card. During your Main Phase: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Omarabs of the Submerzans" per turn.
1807131.name: Omarabs of the Submerzans

1807150.effect:
FLIP: You can Special Summon 1 "Submerzan" monster from your GY in face-down Defense Position.
You can Special Summon this card (from your hand) in face-down Defense Position. If your opponent targets this card for an attack or an effect, while it is face-down: Change this card to face-up Attack Position, then, if it was targeted by an effect, you can destroy 1 card on the field. During your Main Phase: You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Vuhoreels of the Submerzans" per turn.
1807150.name: Vuhoreels of the Submerzans

1814816.effect:
FLIP: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; move it to an adjacent unoccupied Zone, then negate the effects of all cards your opponent controls in that moved card's column until the end of this turn.
When your opponent activates a card or effect in this card's column, while this card is face-down (Quick Effect): You can change this card to face-up Attack Position. You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Cheretle, Submerzan Empress" once per turn.
1814816.name: Cheretle, Submerzan Empress

1807122.effect:
FLIP: You can activate 1 of the following effects.
● You can target 1 card in your opponent's Main Monster Zone; if it is Set, reveal it, also place it in your opponent's unoccupied Spell & Trap Zone in the same column as a Continuous Spell with the following effect: "Once per turn: You can send this card to the GY; draw 1 card, then shuffle 1 card from your hand into the Deck."
● You can target 1 card in your opponent's Spell & Trap Zone; if it is Set, reveal it, also Special Summon it in Attack Position as a Normal Monster in your opponent's unoccupied Main Monster Zone in the same column as that targeted card (Sea Serpent/DARK/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0). (That card is NOT treated as a Spell or Trap.)
When your opponent activates a card or effect in this card's column, while this card is face-down (Quick Effect): You can change this card to Attack Position. You can change this card to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Kythale, Submerzan Emperor" once per turn.
1807122.name: Kythale, Submerzan Emperor

1807142.effect: If your "Submerzan" monster battles: You can have your opponent take all battle damage you would take from that battle. During your Main Phase: You can change 1 Set WATER "Submerzan" monster you control to face-up Attack Position, and if you do, you can change 1 face-up "Submerzan" monster you control to face-down Defense Position. You can reveal 1 Set non-WATER "Submerzan" monster you control; rearrange the face-down Defense Position monsters in your Main Monster Zones, then change them to face-down Defense Position. You can only use each effect of "Submerzan Sub-World" once per turn.
1807142.name: Submerzan Sub-World

1816927.effect: You can reveal 1 Set non-WATER "Submerzan" monster you control; rearrange the face-down Defense Position monsters in your Main Monster Zones, then change them to face-down Defense Position. If your opponent's card changes Zones: You can target 1 card your opponent controls; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Submerzan Sublimation" once per turn.
1816927.name: Submerzan Sublimation

1807185.effect: Reveal 1 Set non-WATER "Submerzan" monster you control, then banish any number of cards from your hand or field; Special Summon "Submerzan" monsters from your Deck, up to the number of cards banished to activate this effect in face-down Defense Position. You cannot Summon monsters from your Extra Deck during the turn you activate this card, except "Submerzan" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Submergence" per turn.
1807185.name: Submerzan Submergence

1814821.effect: Change all Set monsters you control to face-up Defense Position, then destroy all monsters you control, except for "Submerzan" monsters. During the End Phase, change as many monsters you control to facedown Defense Position as possible, then draw 1 card. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Submission" per turn.
1814821.name: Submerzan Submission

1814823.effect: Target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and 1 "Submerzan" monster you control; Set those targets. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Subservience" per turn.
1814823.name: Submerzan Subservience

1814829.effect: If your opponent activates a card or effect, while you control a Set monster: Change 1 Set "Submerzan" monster you control to face-up Attack Position; negate the activation. You can only activate 1 "Submerzan Subterfuge" per turn.
1814829.name: Submerzan Subterfuge

1814994.effect:
2 Sea Serpent monsters
This card can be treated as 2 Tributes for the Tribute Set of a monster. When this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Submerzan" monster from your Deck in face-down Defense Position, but for the rest of this turn, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except in face-down Defense Position. You can change 1 Set "Submerzan" monster you control to face-up Attack Position; this turn, you can Normal Set 1 monster, in addition to your Normal Summon/Set (You can only gain this effect once per turn.) You can only use each effect of "Meduzelly, Princess of the Submerzans" once per turn.
1814994.name: Meduzelly, Princess of the Submerzans

1863061.effect: If you control a "Shinadow" monster: You can Special Summon this card, then add 1 "Shinadow" monster from your face-up Extra Deck to your hand. If you have a "Shinadow" monster in your face-up Spell/Trap zone, you can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Spell from your Deck to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow Pagoda" once per turn.
1863061.name: Shinadow Pagoda
1863061.pendulum_effect: You can destroy this face-up card in your Pendulum Zone: Special Summon 1 "Shinadow" non-Ritual monster from your hand, GY or face-up Extra Deck, and if you do, your opponent gains 1000 LP. You can only use this effect of "Shinadow Pagoda" once per turn.

1869172.effect: If you control a "Shinadow" Ritual Monster: You can Special Summon this card from your hand or face-up Extra Deck. You can reveal 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Monster in your hand, or target 1 face-up "Shinadow" Ritual Monster on your field or in your Pendulum Zone; this cards Level becomes equal to that monsters. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow Chie" once per turn.
1869172.name: Shinadow Chie
1869172.pendulum_effect: If a "Shinadow" Ritual Monster is summoned to your side of the field, you can target 1 "Shinadow" card in your GY: Add it to your hand. You can only use this effect of "Shinadow Chie" once per turn.

1860560.effect: If this card is Normal or Pendulum Summoned: You can Tribute this card; reveal 3 "Shinadow" monsters with different names from your Deck, have your opponent randomly choose 1 of them, and you either place it in your Pendulum Zone or Special Summon it, also add the rest to the Extra Deck. When this card is destroyed by an opponent's card (either by battle or by card effect): You can choose 1 Shinadow Ritual Monster in your Deck; place it in your Extra Deck or in your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow Dokue" once per turn.
1860560.name: Shinadow Dokue
1860560.pendulum_effect: If you have a "Shinadow" card in your other Pendulum Zone, you can activate this effect: Pendulum Summon 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Monster, from your hand or Extra Deck (This Special Summon is also treated as a Ritual Summon.) You can destroy this card: Add 1 Shinadow Ritual Monster Card from your Deck to your hand. You can only use one effect of "Shinadow Dokue" per turn, and only once per turn.

1860589.effect: This card can be used to Ritual Summon any "Shinadow" Ritual Monster from your hand or Extra Deck. You must also Tribute monsters in your hand, field and Pendulum Zone, whose total Levels equal the Level of that Ritual Monster or more, then, if both materials were monsters in the Pendulum Zones, target 1 card on the field: Destroy it. If your opponent Special Summon a monster(s), while this card is in your GY, you can banish 1 card from your GY; set this card to your side of the field, but banish it when it leaves the field. You can only use this effect of "Shinadow Call" once per turn.
1860589.name: Shinadow Call

1861078.effect:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Shinadow Call". You can target 1 card in your opponents GY: Banish it. If a "Shinadow" monster is placed into your Spell/Trap zone, you can Special Summon a "Shinadow" monster from your hand or face-up Extra Deck. If this card is Tributed for the Ritual Summon of a "Shinadow" monster, that monster gains this effect:
● Target 1 card in your opponents GY: Banish it.
You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Infernal Doom" once per turn.
1861078.name: Shinadow of the Infernal Doom
1861078.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shinadow" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. You can discard 1 non-Ritual "Shinadow" monster: Add 1 non-Ritual "Shinadow" monster with a different name from your Deck to your hand with a different name, than you can put 1 "Shinadow" Monster from your face-up Extra Deck into your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Infernal Doom" once per turn

1861054.effect:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Shinadow Call". You can target 1 card your opponent controls: Destroy it. If a "Shinadow" monster is Ritual Summoned, using a monster in your Spell/Trap zone; you can Special Summon 1 "Shinadow" monster from your GY or face-up Extra Deck. If this card is Tributed for the Ritual Summon of a "Shinadow" monster, that monster gains this effect:
● Target 1 card on the field: Destroy it.
You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Forbidden Fortress" once per turn.
1861054.name: Shinadow of the Forbidden Fortress
1861054.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shinadow" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. You can discard 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Monster: Add 1 "Shinadow" Ritual Monster from your Deck to your hand with a different name, than you can put 1 "Shinadow" Monster from your face-up Extra Deck into your Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "SHinadow of the Forbidden Fortress" once per turn.

1863042.effect:
You can Ritual Summon this card with "Shinadow Call". You can target 1 "Shinadow" non-Ritual Monster in your face-up Extra Deck: Special Summon it. If your opponent activtes a monster effect; you can negate the activation. If this card is Tributed for the Ritual Summon of a "Shinadow" monster, that monster gains this effect:
● You can target 1 "Shinadow" non-Ritual Monster in your face-up Extra Deck: Special Summon it.
You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Ancient Temple" once per turn.
1863042.name: Shinadow of the Ancient Temple
1863042.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shinadow" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. You can place 1 "Shinadow" card from your hand into your Extra Deck, face-up: Draw 1 card, then discard 1 card. You can only use each effect of "Shinadow of the Ancient Temple" once per turn

1863015.effect: You can Ritual Summon this card with "Shinadow Call". If this card was Ritual Summoned using a monster in the Spell/Trap zone, you can Tribute 1 monster you control: Destroy all monsters your opponent controls. During the Main Phase, you can pay 1000 LP; put 1 "Shinadow" monster from your GY or Deck into your Pendulum Scale. If this face-up card in your Monster Zone would leave the field, you can place it in your Pendulum Scale. You can only use each effect of "Abyss King of the Shinadow" once per turn.
1863015.name: Abyss King of the Shinadow
1863015.pendulum_effect: You cannot Pendulum Summon monsters, except "Shinadow" monsters. This effect cannot be negated. During the Main Phase, you can immediately after this effect resolves, Pendulum Summon up to 2 "Shinadow" Ritual Monsters from your hand, GY or face-up Extra Deck, ignoring their summoning conditions, but their effects are negated, also any battle damage your opponent takes for the rest of the turn is halved. You can discard 1 Card; Tribute "Shinadow" monsters from your hand or field whose total Levels equal 10 or more, and if you do, Ritual Summon this card from the Pendulum Zone. You can only use each effect of "Abyss King of the Shinadow" once per turn.

1764957.effect: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.● Once per chain, if your opponent controls 2 or more monsters that were Special Summoned from the Main Deck and/or Extra Deck (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this turn, except Gemini monsters, also destroy all monsters on the field.
1764957.name: NTG Safeguard Cibo

1764824.effect: This card is treated as a Normal Monster while face-up on the field or in the GY. While this card is a Normal Monster on the field, you can Normal Summon it to have it become an Effect Monster with this effect.● You cannot Special Summon monsters, except Gemini monsters. Negate the effects of all cards your opponent controls in this card's column. Once per turn, during your opponent's End Phase: Target 1 card you control; destroy it.
1764824.name: NTG Safeguard Sana

1764858.effect: Set 1 "Net Terminal Genes" Trap or 1 "Netsphere" directly from your Deck, except "Net Terminal Genes - Replica", also it can be activated this turn. You can banish this card and 1 "NTG Safeguard" monster from your GY; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this Duel, except "NTG Safeguard" monsters, also Special Summon 1 "NTG Safeguard" monster from your Deck, with a different name than the banished monster. You can only use 1 effect of "Net Terminal Genes - Replica" per turn, and only once that turn.
1764858.name: Net Terminal Genes - Replica

1764903.effect: Until the end of this turn, "NTG Safeguard" Gemini monsters you control becomes Effect Monsters, and gains their effects, also "NTG Safeguard" monsters you control cannot be destroyed by battle, but change all monsters you control to face-down Defense Position during the next End Phase. You can banish this card and 1 "NTG Safeguard" monster from your GY; you cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this Duel, except "NTG Safeguard" monsters, also Special Summon 1 "NTG Safeguard" monster from you Deck, with a different name than the banished monster. You can only use 1 effect of "Net Terminal Genes - Memory" per turn, and only once that turn.
1764903.name: Net Terminal Genes - Memory

1764924.effect: Declare 1 card type (Monster, Spell, or Trap), then target 1 "NTG Safeguard" monster you control; equip this card to it. It is unaffected by your opponent's card effects of the declared card type. You can only activate 1 "Net Terminal Genes - Immunity" per turn.
1764924.name: Net Terminal Genes - Immunity

1764999.effect: If you control a "NTG Safeguard" monster: Target 1 monster on the field; shuffle it into the Deck. During your Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; Shuffle all "NTG Safeguard" monsters that are banished into the Deck (min. 1), then, if you control a "NTG Safeguard" Gemini monster that is treated as an Effect Monster, you can draw 1 card. You can only use 1 "Net Terminal Genes - Vanish" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1764999.name: Net Terminal Genes - Vanish

1765054.effect: When a card or effect is activated that would destroy a card(s), while you control a "NTG Safeguard" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, shuffle it into the Deck. If you control exactly 1 monster, you can activate this card from your hand.
1765054.name: Net Terminal Genes - Shell

1765044.effect: Target 1 "NTG Safeguard" monster you control; it gains 1000 ATK/DEF for each "NTG Safeguard" monsters you currently control until the end of this turn. You can only activate 1 "Net Terminal Genes - Safeguard Mode" per turn.
1765044.name: Net Terminal Genes - Safeguard Mode

1765072.effect: Target 1 of your banished "NTG Safeguard" Gemini monsters; Special Summon it as an Effect Monster that gains its effects, but shuffle it into the Deck during the next End Phase. During the Main Phase, except the turn this card was sent to the GY: You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "NTG Safeguard" monster from your hand. You can only use 1 "Net Terminal Genes - Reboot" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1765072.name: Net Terminal Genes - Reboot

1765081.effect: If you control no monsters: You cannot Special Summon monsters for the rest of this Duel, except "NTG Safeguard" or "Toha" monsters, also Special Summon 1 "NTG Safeguard" Gemini monster from your Deck as an Effect Monster that gains its effects.
1765081.name: Net Terminal Gate

1764979.effect: When a Spell/Trap Card, or monster effect, is activated, while you control a "NTG Safeguard" monster: Shuffle 1 Gemini monster you control into the Deck; negate the activation, and if you do, shuffle that card into the Deck. You can only activate 1 "Net Terminal Genesis" once per turn.
1764979.name: Net Terminal Genesis

1732911.effect: If this card is Normal Summoned: You can send 1 "Aquarian Art" card from your Deck to your GY. (Quick Effect): You can discard this card, then target 1 "Aquarian Kiara" monster you control and 1 monster your opponent controls; switch their ATK/DEF with each other until the end of this turn.
1732911.name: Aquarius Kiara's Contractor
1732911.pendulum_effect: You can reveal 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster or "Aquarian Art" Spell/Trap in your hand and pay 1000 LP; this turn, you can Normal Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster in addition to your Normal Summon/Set. (Even if this card leaves the field. You can only gain this effect once per turn.)

1727240.effect: If this card is Summoned: You can add 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster or 1 "Aquarius Art" Spell from your Deck to your hand. If an "Aquarius Kiara" card(s) you control would be destroyed by battle or card effect, you can banish this card from your GY instead. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Stage 0" once per turn.
1727240.name: Aquarius Kiara - Maiden

1727260.effect:
You can Tribute 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control with a different original name; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. This card gains 100 ATK/DEF for every "Aquarian Art" card in your GY. If you activate a Spell/Trap Card: You can apply 1 of the following effects.
● 1 card in this card's column has its effects negated. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Caster" once per turn.
● 1 other "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control gains 500 ATK and DEF
1727260.name: Aquarius Kiara - Caster

1727317.effect: You can Tribute 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control with a different original name; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. This card gains 100 ATK/DEF for every "Aquarian Art" card in your GY. If you activate a Spell/Trap Card: You can destroy 1 monster in this card's column. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Bladedancer" once per turn.
1727317.name: Aquarius Kiara - Bladedancer

1727347.effect: You can Tribute 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control with a different original name; Special Summon this card from your hand or GY. This card gains 100 ATK/DEF for every "Aquarian Art" card in your GY. If this card is targeted by a card effect while you control another "Aquarius Kiara" card: You can banish this card until the end phase. If this card returns to the field after being banished by its own effect: Target 1 card your opponent controls: banish it. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Dragoon" once per turn.
1727347.name: Aquarius Kiara - Dragoon

1729710.effect: When a Spell/Trap, or monster effect, is activated while you control an "Aquarius Kiara" monster: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it OR send 1 "Aquarian Art" Spell/Trap from your Deck to your GY. You can only activate 1 "Aquarian Art - Ocean's Sigil" per turn.
1729710.name: Aquarian Art - Ocean's Sigil

1727440.effect:
You can only activate this card if you control an "Aquarius Kiara" monster. Apply the following effects in sequence depending on how many "Aquarian Arts" cards you control and are in your GY.
●2+: Destroy one Spell/Trap card your opponent controls.
●4+: Negate the effects of 1 monster your opponent controls that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck until the end of the turn.
●6+: Shuffle 4 "Aquarian Art" or "Aquarius Kiara" cards in your GY into your Deck: Draw 2 cards, but they cannot be activated this turn unless they are "Aquarius Kiara" or "Aquarian Art" cards.
1727440.name: Aquarian Art - Ocean Dragon Strike

1727384.effect: You can send 1 card from the top of the Deck to the GY for every "Aquarius Kiara" card you control. You can banish this card from your GY; add 1 "Aquarian Art" Spell/Trap from your GY to your hand, except "Aquarian Art - Pure Sea Stones". You can only use 1 "Aquarian Art - Pure Sea Stones" effect per turn, and only once that turn.
1727384.name: Aquarian Art - Pure Sea Stones

1869782.effect: You can banish 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara" Link Monster from your Extra Deck. If the activation of an "Aquarian Art" card in your possession was negated by your opponent's card effect and sent to your GY: You can discard 1 card; add that card to your hand. You can only use each effect of "Aquarian Art Domain" once per turn.
1869782.name: Aquarian Art Domain

1729811.effect: You can target 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster you control; send it to the GY, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster from your Deck with a different name. You can banish this card from your GY; Special Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara Token" (Aqua/WATER/Level 1/ATK 0/DEF 0) in Defense Position. You cannot Special Summon monsters the turn you activate either of these effects, except "Aquarius Kiara" monsters. You can only use 1 "Aquarian Art - Magical Contract" effect per turn, and only once that turn
1729811.name: Aquarian Art - Magical Contract

1729739.effect:
1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster.
Gains ATK equal to the combined original ATK of the materials used for its Link Summon. If this card is Special Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Aquarius Kiara" monster to your zone this card points to. (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Aquarian Art" Spell from your GY, then target 1 "Aquarian Art" Spell in your GY; this effect becomes that (card/Spell)'s effect when that card is activated. You can only use each effect of "Aquarius Kiara - Masterclass" once per turn.
1729739.name: Aquarius Kiara - Masterclass
